title: Ep. - 179 - DANNI BAIRD FROM SOUTHERN CHARM
description:
Danni Baird from Bravo’s Southern Charm talks about how she was pulled into a major storyline on the show this season and the aftermath. 


Anthony Lario reviews this season of Real Housewives of Orange County. 


Author and Boston police officer Brian Dunford reviews Who Killed Garrett Phillips on HBO.


Reality Life with Kate Casey
